title: Ash - Meltdown [2004] With Live CD [DB]
description:
Meltdown is an album by Ash, which was initially released on May 17, 2004 through Infectious Records. On March 8, 2005 the album was released in the United States. It is a darker and more heavier-sounding record than Free All Angels.

The US release includes bonus tracks "Shockwave", "Solace", and "Cool It Down".

In the UK, a limited edition of the album was also made, comprising two Compact Discs, one with the 11 studio recordings and one featuring live versions of the 11 new songs and live versions of three other songs ("A Life Less Ordinary", "Darkside Lightside", and "Burn Baby Burn").

The album was certified Gold by the BPI on March 18th, 2005.

Track listing

1. "Meltdown" (Wheeler/Hatherley) ? 3:24
2. "Orpheus" (Wheeler) ? 4:16
3. "Evil Eye" (Wheeler) ? 3:26
4. "Clones" (Wheeler) ? 4:00
5. "Starcrossed" (Wheeler) ? 4:50
6. "Out of the Blue" (Wheeler/Hamilton) ? 3:24
7. "Renegade Cavalcade" (Wheeler) ? 3:27
8. "Detonator" (Wheeler) ? 3:38
9. "On a Wave" (Wheeler) ? 4:27
10. "Won&#039;t Be Saved" (Wheeler) ? 3:41
11. "Vampire Love" (Wheeler) ? 3:46
12. "Shockwave" (Bonus track on U.S. version)
13. "Solace" (Bonus track on U.S. version)
14. "Cool It Down" (Bonus track on U.S. version)


(This torrent also features the Live bonus CD from the UK limited edition version of the album and a cover of The Buzzcocks hit "Everybody&#039;s Happy Nowadays" featuring Chris Martin of Coldplay.)
